channel.title: How do I set non-wild areas?
channel.description: Im trying to make a new home for my server and I need to figure out how it works... (i know where to go but what do i do :confused:)

item.title: How do I set non-wild areas?
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

alright i’ll mess around with it and see what i can do, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I set non-wild areas?

item.title: How do I set non-wild areas?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You retrieve the North west, south east coordinates, or it is the other way around, I am not sure, then you add the two X coordinates, then the two Y coordinates, depending on what your server has designed it to be like.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I set non-wild areas?

item.title: How do I set non-wild areas?
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:2, topic:280654”]Add the coordinates correctly in “boolean nonWild”, I think, or "Boolean “isInWilderness”.[/quote] i see (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) are the co-ords in there making a box?
